turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm really bored and want to watch a movie. I'm in the mood for something... sci-fi, I think. What do you recommend?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, great! Based on your preference for sci-fi, I can suggest a few popular and well-regarded films. Have you seen 'Dune' (2021) or 'Arrival' (2016)? They're both quite different but are modern classics in the genre.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, I've seen Dune, it was alright. Arrival was pretty good too. What about something a little less mainstream? Maybe something with time travel or alternate realities, but nothing too cheesy, please! I'm so tired of cheesy sci-fi.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Alright, let me dig a little deeper. How about 'Primer' (2004)? It's a very low-budget but intellectually stimulating time travel film that avoids most of the typical tropes. Or, if you're open to animation, 'Paprika' (2006) explores dream worlds and altered realities in a visually stunning way. Be warned, Primer can be a bit confusing!
